roleset.name: summon, convene a meeting
roleset.note: CONVOKE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from convoke.01-v)

role.descr: theme, meeting or those summoned to be part of the meeting

example.name: Transitive, with location
example.text: I convoke around my deathbed my friends who are confirmed atheists as I am.
example.arg: my friends who are confirmed atheists as I am
